nodes.text: A green daisy was a special type of flower native to the planet Lothal. They were dazzling flowers whose blooming was triggered by the presence of other life-forms. They had special follicles on their stems that were highly sensitive, enabling them to detect breath or heat and would blossom for anyone that took the time to observe them.
Ezra Bridger enjoyed watching these flowers and was refreshed by the mere sight of watching the spread of their petals from the flowers' emerald center, no matter how bad his day had been.
